summary: This is a simple recoloring of the hood section of all Dragon Priest Masks, to a black one with a red pattern, thus matching daedric armor better.
descriptionHtml:
==Daedric Dragon Priest Hood==

This is a simple recoloring of the hood section of all Dragon Priest Masks, to a black one with a red pattern, thus matching daedric armor better.

Feel free to comment and such.

==Installation==

Unzip the file, and place the \"Textures\" folder into you \"Data\" folder 
(wherever Skyrim is installed). Upon startup and under the \"Data Files\" window,
 select \"Load Loose Files\".

To uninstall search for the files you copied, listed below, and remove them.

==Replaces==

dragonpriesthood.dds

==Updates==

12/9/11 - Launch: Black and red hood.
author: Dalsio

files.name: Hood Black and Red
files.changelogHtml: First version, black and red to match daedric armor.
